properties.address: Desborough Library, High Street, Desborough, Northamptonshire NN14 2QS
properties.description: We cater for everyone, with emphasis on children under 5 and retired people We run weekly children's activities on Wednesdays and Fridays, there is a Scrabble Club every Thursday and a monthly Book Discussion Group, plus weekly Knit and Natter on Tuesdays
properties.title: Desborough Library and Community Hub

properties.address: Cornerstone Methodist Church, Corby, Northants NN18 9HY
properties.title: Here4U at Cornerstone Methodist Church Corby

properties.description: Kettering Library is a public library which is part of North Northamptonshire Council. The library is free to drop in and spend time - we have a variety of genres of books including Large Print and audiobooks, free internet access on public computers, activities for children and families, board games and more. We are open 9-6 Mondays to Fridays and 9-5 on Saturdays.
properties.title: Kettering Library

properties.address: Rothwell Methodist Church, Kettering, Northamptonshire NN14 6BW
properties.description: The space is open to all. Using the main hall and kitchen at Rothwell Methodist Church, the place of warm welcome will provide refreshments and food, games/newspapers/craft activities/puzzles, and space for conversation. During January 2024: Fridays: 9 a.m. - 7 p.m. With options for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Saturdays: 9 a.m. - 1 pm. Brunch. With sponsorship of Rothwell Town Council and East Mercia Methodist Circuit.
properties.title: Place of Warm Welcome

properties.description: A community hall serving free hot drinks, biscuits and soup. Magazines, Scrabble, Dominoes available. Table tennis table and equipment provided. Play area for children.
properties.title: St Giles Community Centre, Lower Street, Desborough

properties.description: We are a warm friendly place, with hot food and drinks available every Tuesday that are free to all who visit us. Support: There are plenty of volunteers here who will sit with you, chat, play a game or listen. If you need any support finding information or getting help, from housing to benefits we can sign post you to local or national organisations. Activities: There are an assortment of games available such as Uno/ magnetic chess / Chess/ Connect4 and various craft activities too. You can also charge your phone. Please feel free to join us here any Tuesday afternoon between 12pm and 3pm. (We are closed for the month of August)
properties.title: Warm Welcome Space

hours._text: Available all day every day dependent on level of grant funding and number of volunteers to run it

properties.address: Brixworth Library and Community Centre , Spratton Road , Brixworth , Northampton , NN6 9DS,

hours._text: Monday to Thursday 10am to 3pm Friday 9:30am to 2:30pm Saturday 9:30am to 1pm
